description.fr:
{%FightTurnStarted} {Summoning:784!} gagne un {%ELEMENTARY_STATE} aléatoire et pose un {ObjectMechanism:1607}, si  {%astral} est déjà présent sur lui pose un {ObjectMechanism:355} à la place.
\---
{Summoning:784!} est insensible aux effets des sorts du même élément présent sur lui.
\---
{%AT} : Inflige {value:pc,percent} de son {%AT} en plus par {ObjectMechanism:1607!} sur le terrain.
description.en:
{%FightTurnStarted} {Summoning:784!} gains a random {%ELEMENTARY_STATE} and places one {ObjectMechanism:1607}; if {%astral} is already on him, places a {ObjectMechanism:355} instead.
\---
{Summoning:784!} is immune to the effects of spells in the same element as the one on him.
\---
{%AT} : Inflicts {value:pc,percent} of his {%AT} in addition for each {ObjectMechanism:1607!} on the field.
description.es:
{%FightTurnStarted} {Summoning:784!} gana un {%ELEMENTARY_STATE} aleatorio y pone una {ObjectMechanism:1607}, si {%astral} ya está presente en él pone una {ObjectMechanism:355} en su lugar.
\---
{Summoning:784!} es insensible a los efectos de los hechizos del mismo elemento presente en él.
\---
{%AT}: Inflige {value:pc,percent} de su {%AT} más por {ObjectMechanism:1607!} en el terreno.
description.de:
{%FightTurnStarted} {Summoning:784!} erhält 1\_zufälligen {%ELEMENTARY_STATE} und platziert 1\_{ObjectMechanism:1607}. Falls {%astral} bereits auf ihm liegt, platziert stattdessen 1\_{ObjectMechanism:355}.
\---
{Summoning:784!} ist immun gegen Zaubereffekte des gleichen Elements, wie bereits vorhanden.
\---
{%AT}: Verursacht zusätzlich {value:pc,percent} seines {%AT}s je {ObjectMechanism:1607!} auf dem Spielfeld.
description.pt:
{%FightTurnStarted} {Summoning:784!} recebe um {%ELEMENTARY_STATE} aleatório e coloca um {ObjectMechanism:1607}, se {%astral} já estiver presente coloca sobre ele, em vez disso, um {ObjectMechanism:355}.
\---
{Summoning:784!} é invulnerável aos efeitos dos feitiços do mesmo elemento presente nele.
\---
{%AT}: Inflige {value:pc,percent} do seu {%AT} a mais por {ObjectMechanism:1607!} no campo de batalha.
